languages.text: "Мятежникам удалось выкрасть вокс-станцию. Они прослушивали переговоры ваших людей".
"The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They have been listening to your people's communications."
languages.original_text: "Мятежникам удалось выкрасть вокс-станцию. Они прослушивали переговоры ваших людей".

traits.locale_text: "The insurgents managed to steal a vox-station. They listened in on your people's communications."
"The insurgents managed to steal a vox-station. They listened in on your people's communications."
"The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They'd been spying on your people's communications."
"The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They'd been spying on your people's communications."
"The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They have been listening to your people's communications."
"The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They have been listening to your people's communications."

languages.text: "Die Aufständischen haben einen Vox-Transmitter gestohlen. Sie haben die Nachrichten Eurer Leute abgehört."
languages.original_text: "The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They have been listening to your people's communications."

traits.locale_text: "Die Aufständischen haben einen Vox-Transmitter gestohlen. Sie belauschen die Kommunikation Eurer Leute."

languages.text: « Les insurgés sont parvenus à voler un émetteur vox. Ils espionnaient les communications de vos hommes. »
languages.original_text: "The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They have been listening to your people's communications."

traits.locale_text: « Les insurgés sont parvenus à voler un émetteur-vox. Ils espionnaient les communications de vos hommes. »

languages.text: “叛军偷走了一台通讯器，他们一直借此监听你的手下之间的所有通讯。”
languages.original_text: "The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They have been listening to your people's communications."

traits.locale_text: “叛军偷走了一台通讯器，他们一直借此监听你的手下之间的所有通讯。”

languages.text: 「反乱者はヴォクスキャストを奪った。奴らは、そちらの通信を盗聴していたのだ」
languages.original_text: "The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They have been listening to your people's communications."

traits.locale_text: 「反乱者はヴォクスキャストを奪った。奴らは、そちらの通信を盗聴していたのだ」

languages.text: «Los insurgentes lograron robar un voco amplificador. Habían estado escuchando las comunicaciones de su gente».
languages.original_text: "The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They have been listening to your people's communications."

traits.locale_text: «Los insurgentes lograron robar un voco amplificador. Habían estado espiando las comunicaciones de su gente».

languages.text: "Asiler bir voksyayar çalmayı başarmış. Adamlarınızın konuşmalarını dinliyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The insurgents managed to steal a vox-caster. They have been listening to your people's communications."

traits.locale_text: "Asiler bir voksyayar çalmayı başarmış. Adamlarınızın konuşmalarını dinliyorlar."
